product_name: KRISTIN ESS HAIRDry Finish Working Texture Hair Spray
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingGive BackCreate a soft, matte texture or lived-in look with Kristin Ess Hair's Dry Finish Working Texture Hair Spray for Volume + Texture. For instant volume + texture with ultra-light hold.
details: DetailsBenefitsCreates effortless, undone, soft matte textureInstantly volumizes with weightless, ultra-light holdTexture buildingFor all hair typesContains Zip-Up Technology: Proprietary strengthening complex designed to "zip-up" split ends while targeting weak areas of the hair, smoothing the appearance of damaged cuticles and helping protect hair from environmental stressors + color fadeCruelty FreeColor + Keratin SafeFormulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesSulfatesItem 2579385How To UseCreate your desired hairstyle. Add textured, soft matte finish and lasting hold by spraying this at the root first and then add a small amount from middle to ends.IngredientsHydrofluorocarbon 152a, Dimethyl Ether, Alcohol Denat., Vp/Va Copolymer, Hypnea Musciformis Extract, Litchi Chinensis Pericarp Extract, Sargassum Filipendula Extract, Salvia Hispanica Seed Oil, Gelidiella Acerosa Extract, Algin, Carrageenan, Coco-Glucoside, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Chitosan, Sorbitol, Cetearamidoethyldiethonium Succinoyl Hydrolyzed Pea Protein, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Xanthan Gum, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Acetyl Triethyl Citrate, Peg/Ppg-17/18 Dimethicone, Alumina, Silica, Sodium Oxide, Calcium Oxide, Potassium Oxide, Glycerin, Triethylene Glycol, Benzyl Alcohol, Propylene Glycol, Fragrance.
how_to_use: Create your desired hairstyle. Add textured, soft matte finish and lasting hold by spraying this at the root first and then add a small amount from middle to ends.

reviews.headline: Love this stuff and smells so delicious!
reviews.comments: This is a must have!

reviews.headline: Continues to be my hair go-to
reviews.comments: I continue to repurchase this again and again because it just gives your hair the perfect texture and boost with the crunchy feel of hair spray or the residue from dry shampoo. Great for someone with fine hair and bangs. Also smells amazing

reviews.headline: Fly away hair mess!
reviews.comments: This does not work on my fine hair.  Adds no hold and very little texture, in fact makes my hair a fly away mess and a prickly, uncomfortable feeling.  I tried to like it and made sure I applied it right.  Only positive point was it made hair feel soft and clean, but too soft for hold.  Might work for coarse hair better. Many reviews give it good ratings, but again not for me.

reviews.headline: So impressed!
reviews.comments: This will be the only holding spray ill use from here on out. It does everything you'd want and expect it to: holds curls while adding texture and volume WITHOUT feeling crunchy or weighed down. Perfection.

reviews.headline: Smells amazing
reviews.comments: This is a newer product for me and I absolutely love the smell and it adds nice texture without making my hair feels like it is full of grit - I bought a second one of these right after because I liked it so much

reviews.headline: Best hair product I've ever used.
reviews.comments: My hair is thin and fine, and this product is magic.  I spray my hair first, then use my curling iron.  The curls stay and my hair looks and feels thicker. I usually use the full size product, but I was traveling this past week and was so happy to see that it comes in a travel size.

reviews.headline: Better for thicker hair
reviews.comments: It's a decent product but not for my fine hair. It seems better for thicker hair that won't be weight down or flattened by the product. I received the product for free to review

reviews.headline: Decent
reviews.comments: Not the best for wavy thin hair, better for thicker hair

reviews.headline: Overbearing smell
reviews.comments: Really wanted to like this product. The packaging is great and the spray nozzle covered a lot of surface on my hair. Texture was average, however left my hair a bit sticky and tacky (I have fine hair). The one thing I couldn't bypass was the smell üò£ It has a very potent fragrance that was sometimes overbearing - even if I sprayed a little.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: Love Love Love ULTA

reviews.headline: Horrible
reviews.comments: This litterly was like spraying air on my hair!! Worst product I ever used.

reviews.headline: Not for fine, straight hair.
reviews.comments: If you have fine, silky hair this product is not for you. I used my Chi Vibes to create beach waves hoping this product would give some texture and lightweight hold. It made my hair stiff with no texture. I have straight fine blonde hair so texturizing products don't usually do anything for my hair. I was hoping this product was different. I was also hoping this had some dry shampoo product in it but it does not. The name is kind of deceiving. I think this would be a good product for someone who has natural waves and thicker hair.

reviews.headline: My Go-To Spray
reviews.comments: I really like this product. I initially purchased the travel size to try it out. It worked so I purchased the full size. I have hair that easily frizzes up and this product reduces the frizz while adding a nice textured and protecting my style for the day. The spray smells wonderful too.

reviews.headline: Smells amazing
reviews.comments: First off can we talk about how good this smells. Amazing!! I found it gave good texture to my hair but since I straighten it, it loses a lot of texture. Doesn't weigh down your hair and doesn't leave a sticky residue like some texture sprays do. Overall I think it's a great product! I received this product complementary to try for a review.

reviews.headline: Super flexible and lightweight. A must have!
reviews.comments: Excellent product!

reviews.headline: Don't buy this!
reviews.comments: Hated the smell of this product. Plus they claim it's clean but, actually isn't! Good luck trying to get the product to come out of the spray top too. Stay away from this spray!

reviews.headline: Do not recommend.
reviews.comments: The spray nozzle is absolutely the worst quality.    I just used it for the first time.  It was aweful pressing down on it getting little squirts out.    What I did get out I don't feel like did anything for my hair.  It's so bad I'm actually returning it.

reviews.headline: Works great
reviews.comments: I use this after I curl my hair to add some volume to the curla and it works really well. My only complaint is the spray is powerful and might get everywhere so be cautious where you use this

reviews.headline: No
reviews.comments: I have to spray outside.  Smell is so strong it gives me a headache. It holds okay.

reviews.headline: Not a fan
reviews.comments: I didn't care for the smell of this product. It also didn't work as well as other texture sprays I've used. My hair fell flat and seemed greasy after using. The trigger was also difficult to spray. Returned the item.

faceoff_positive.comments:
The Kristin Ess Dry Finish Working Texture Spray is a game-changer for fine or thin hair. This lightweight spray adds incredible volume and texture without weighing hair down or leaving it greasy. Whether you're styling curls or aiming for a natural, voluminous look, this product delivers consistent results.

What I Loved:
¬†¬†¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬†¬†¬†¬†Lightweight, Flexible Hold: The spray offers a flexible finish that doesn't feel crunchy or sticky. It keeps your style intact while maintaining a natural feel.
¬†¬†¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬†¬†¬†¬†Versatile Application: You can spray it at the roots for instant lift or throughout your hair for all-over texture. It's great for fluffing up curls or achieving a soft matte finish.
¬†¬†¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬†¬†¬†¬†Cruelty-Free & Safe for Color-Treated Hair: Perfect for those who prioritize ethical and color-safe products in their routine.
¬†¬†¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬†¬†¬†¬†Pleasant, Subtle Scent: The fragrance is fresh and not overpowering, a pleasant change from typical "hairspray-like" smells.

Room for Improvement:
The scent, while pleasant, fades quickly, which could be a drawback if you enjoy lasting fragrance. Additionally, finding the right amount of product to use might take some experimenting, especially for those new to texturizing sprays.

Pro Tips for Best Results:
¬†¬†¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬†¬†¬†¬†Spray it upside down to maximize volume.
¬†¬†¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬†¬†¬†¬†Use it before and after curling for enhanced definition and hold.
¬†¬†¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬†¬†¬†¬†Follow the instructions: start at the roots, then lightly mist from mid-lengths to ends for optimal texture.

Final Thoughts:
Kristin Ess has created a texture spray that's perfect for anyone looking to add volume and shine without sacrificing a lightweight, natural feel. With its reasonable price point and high-quality results, it's a must-try for fine-haired individuals!

Would definitely recommend this product!
faceoff_positive.headline: Amazing

faceoff_negative.comments: I have tons of long, red, curly hair that doesn't listen to me. It takes forever to get my style nailed and touch ups are a serious pain in the you know what. I chose this product because I believed it would help with refreshing my style without the war and it did pretty good. I always choose cruelty free, sulfate free, and paraben free products so I chose this one. The pros are that it is a mean volumizer and seals up split ends extremely well. A quick spray to the roots and work through the ends for volume and taming the split ends. The cons are that it only holds hair in place for a short period of time. My volume dropped after about two hours and I would have lived a little more hold. I also wish it tamed the flyaway better. It definitely keeps the split end frizz away but my hair blew everywhere which gave me an un-brushed look. That could have also been better with some more holding power. This is a very good volumizer and texturizer but it could be a better holding agent. I wouldn't say it would be my first recommendation if someone asked but I wouldn't tell them not to buy it either.
faceoff_negative.headline: Pretty Good for Texture!
